trans-unit.source: Renders the contained 3-D content within the 2-D layout bounds of the Viewport3D element.
The Viewport3D element renders 3-D content while providing features consistent with <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects including 2-D layout, clipping, and input events.

When this element is included as the content of a layout element like <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, specify the size of the Viewport3D by setting its <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> properties (inherited from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>).
Viewport3D extends 2-D hit testing into the 3-D scene by extruding the 2-D hit test point into a 3-D ray.
Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A> method to return detailed hit result information about the hit visual, model, mesh, and point of intersection.
On [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_whistler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], if the display color quality is not set to 32-bit or 16-bit, the Viewport3D might not render as expected.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> class.
Causes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> to arrange its visual content to fit a specified size.
Size that <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> will assume.
The final size of the arranged <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.

Gets or sets a camera object that projects the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] surface of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
This property represents the viewing projection of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] scene.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| > [!NOTE] > The metadata type on this dependency property is , not .
The camera that projects the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] contents to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] surface.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.ChildrenProperty>| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*> dependency property.
To be added.

Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> at a specified position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*> collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
Position of the element in the collection.
Visual at the specified position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*> collection.
Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
An object to add as a child.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
A string to add to the object.

Gets an integer that represents the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D.Children*> collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>.
Integer that represents the number of Visuals in the Children collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>.
